isis.stitle: TSI 08-09-02 - Removing the Hood Assist Tilt Cylinder on ProStar

subjectgroup.subject: Removing the Hood Assist Tilt Cylinder on ProStar

geninfo.para: Prior to removing the Hood Tilt Assist Cylinder, remove the torsion bar mount plates from each side of the hood and position the torsion bars so they will not damage any other components. This will help prevent the torsion bar ends from damaging radiator or transmission oil cooler components. Damage may occur if the torsion bar mount plates are not removed and the hood is opened beyond the limit normally controlled by the Hood Tilt Assist Cylinder.
Refer to service manual S09011 Section 2.9. for Torsion Bar Mount Plate - removal instructions.
